data.title: Mecca White parents, age, biography, net worth, wiki, and latest updates
data.meta_description: Mecca White parents, age, biography, net worth, wiki, and latest updates. Mecca White is a multi-talented American actress, producer, editor, director,
data.text:
Mecca White is a multi-talented American actress, producer, editor, director, writer, singer, and businesswoman. She is well-known as the daughter of Persia White, a prominent Bahamas-born American actress, singer, and musician. She co-starred in the TV show Girlfriends with her mother.

Mecca White is a rising actress who has captivated audiences with her distinct and exceptional acting abilities. She made her professional acting debut at the age of seven in 2002. Juice Truck (2018) was written, directed, and starred by her. She also owns the White Lion clothing line.

Mecca White Biography and Profile Summary

The rising actress was born and raised in Los Angeles, California, and presently resides there. She is an American national of Indian, African, and European descent.

Persia White and Joseph Morgan are her parents. Mecca White’s mother is a well-known singer, songwriter, and musician. She is most remembered for her role as Denise Williams on the short-lived television series Breaker High.

She also appeared in Girlfriends as Lynn Searcy (2000-2008). Joseph Morgan, her stepfather, is a British actor and director best known for his role as Niklaus Mikaelson in The Vampire Diaries.

Saul Williams, a well-known American rapper, singer, songwriter, musician, poet, writer, and actor, was her mother’s first husband. They divorced when she was 14 years old in 2009, and her mother married Joseph Morgan on July 5, 2014.

Mecca White Net Worth

Mecca White has an estimated net worth of $700,000 as of 2023.

Mecca White Age, Height and Weight

Mecca White was born on 7 October 1995 and she is 28 years old. She is 5 feet 4 inches (1.63 m) tall and weighs 50 kg (110 lbs).

Mecca White Education

Mecca received an Associate degree in Film, Cinema, and Video Studies from the Los Angeles Film School in 2016. She also studied acting at The Groundlings, Sanford Meisner Center, New York Film Academy, and London Academy of Music and Dramatic Arts.

Mecca White Career

Mecca White made her professional acting debut in the TV series Girlfriends in 2002, playing Savannah opposite her mother.

Her remarkable performance has led to opportunities in a variety of films and television shows. In 2018, she received praise for her work as the writer, director, and star of the short film Juice Truck. The story follows two socially shy girls who work in a juice truck in Santa Monica, California. Her mother appeared in the film as well.

In 2017, she also appeared in the film Carousel, directed by her stepfather Joseph Morgan. She is currently a rising actress with six acting credits.

Mecca is also a songwriter and singer. She has a variety of tracks available on SoundCloud, including Valentine, Lion Skin, and Reckless Endless Noise.

Aside from acting and singing, she also owns White Lion, an online clothing store where she primarily offers hoodies, T-shirts, purses, and coats.
